snippet.title: Battle of Tallarn - Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/515980
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/horus-heresy-battle-tallarn/id1143515266?ls=1&mt=8

The Horus Heresy: Battle of Tallarn is a turn-based strategy game that recreates one of the most important events in Imperial history. Command a vast array of tanks, Dreadnoughts, Knights and Titans across the toxic landscape. Play as desperate Solar Auxilia units fighting squadrons of Iron Warrior Predators for control of vast underground bunkers. Get ready to fight the largest tank battle in Imperial history with more tanks and more destruction than ever!
